Although Windows Update doesn’t always deliver the latest driver (Learn Why… ), you can try updating your Canon MF743CDW driver easily using this method:

  1. Scroll down the page and select the correct driver for your operating system.

  1. Once downloaded, run the driver file and complete the installation.
